ResourcePreference.name: ResourcePreference
ResourcePreference.description: Represents an account’s preference for a specified service resource on field service work.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the resource preference was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the resource preference was last viewed.

PreferenceType.description: Resource preference type. Values include: Preferred: Indicates that the customer would like their field service work assigned to the resource. Required: Indicates that the resource must be assigned to the customer’s field service work. Excluded: Indicates that the customer doesn’t want their field service work assigned to the resource. Resource preferences serve more as a suggestion than a requirement. You can still assign a service appointment to any resource regardless of the related work order’s resource preferences.

RelatedRecordId.description: The work order or account with the resource preference.

ResourcePreferenceNumber.description: An auto-generated number identifying the resource preference.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource that is preferred, required, or excluded.
